title: Bonds Hint at Rebound: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 18, 2025

title: Amplify launches XRP covered-call ETF targeting 3% monthly income
contentSnippet: Amplify's XRPM fund offers XRP price exposure and targets a 36% annual option premium through weekly covered calls.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Fear Grips Market as BTC Tests Support, Volatility Spikes
contentSnippet: Bitcoin hovered near $91,000 as sentiment hit "extreme fear," volatility jumped and leveraged traders absorbed over $1 billion in liquidations while altcoins fell further.

title: Bitcoin Correction Mirrors April Drop as 2025 Buyers Fall Into the Red
contentSnippet: Market drawdown pushes bitcoin below 2025 key cost basis levels.

title: Bitcoin Drops to Seven-Month Low Under $90K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs have bled hundreds of millions as the market outlook deteriorates, driven by profit-taking and portfolio rebalancing.

title: Deutsche Börse to Add SocGen’s MiCA Stablecoins to Core Market Systems
contentSnippet: Move brings regulated euro and dollar stablecoins into Deutsche Börse’s settlement and collateral tools.

title: Polychain-backed OpenLedger launches OPEN mainnet for AI data attribution and creator payments
contentSnippet: OpenLedger has launched the OPEN Mainnet, an attribution-focused AI blockchain designed to track data provenance and compensate contributors.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum spot ETFs see combined $437 million in outflows
contentSnippet: Recently launched SOL, XRP and LTC ETFs saw positive flows on Monday, potentially signaling early capital rotation toward altcoins.

title: Record $1.26B Outflow Hits BlackRock Bitcoin ETF as Bearish Options Cost Soars
contentSnippet: The price of IBIT has dropped 16% to $52, a level last seen in April.

title: Mastercard Picks Polygon to Bring Verified Usernames to Self-Custody Wallets
contentSnippet: Move introduces verified aliases for crypto transfers and adds an ID layer to self-custody tools.

title: Bitcoin Dominance Is Bleeding With Price, but Market Observers Say Altcoin Season Is on Hold
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s drawdown, alongside cross-pair stability and steady on-chain activity, points to a market clearing excess leverage rather than shifting into a high-beta altcoin run.

title: El Salvador Buys 1,090 BTC as Prices Drop and IMF Pressure Mounts
contentSnippet: The country has added nearly 100 million dollars to the national bitcoin treasury as BTC trades below $90k.

title: Dogecoin Eyes Rebound After Multi-Year Trendline Break Tests $0.15 Floor
contentSnippet: The memecoin's technical structure is weakened, with key support at $0.1520 needing to hold to prevent further declines.

title: XRP Pulls Back From $2.27 Peak Yet Maintains Uptrend Structure Above $2.15
contentSnippet: Traders should watch the $2.15 pivot, as holding this level could lead to a bounce, while a break below may trigger further declines.

title: Mt. Gox moves $956 million worth of bitcoin to unmarked wallet address: Arkham
contentSnippet: While the motive behind the bitcoin transfer remains unclear, such transactions have typically preceded repayments from the defunct exchange.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest purchases $10 million worth of Bullish shares
contentSnippet: Ark's latest purchases came as Bullish's stock slid on the New York Stock Exchange, closing down 4.5% at $36.75 on Monday.

title: Bitcoin dips below $90,000, marking ‘significant’ psychological break: analysts
contentSnippet: One analyst noted $80,000 as a critical threshold, where a break below could lead to lows of around $74,000 seen in February.

title: Two Technical Signals Hinting at a Bitcoin Bear Market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's bear market outlook firms as 80% of key on-chain metrics flash red, with derivatives and options traders betting on more downside.

title: TD Cowen Says Strategy's Bitcoin-Buying Engine Remains Intact Despite Market Volatility
contentSnippet: TD Cowen kept its $535 target, citing strong preferred-share demand and rising Bitcoin per share despite a narrowing NAV premium.

title: El Salvador discloses largest single-day BTC purchase of $100 million as bitcoin dips lower
contentSnippet: However, it is unclear whether El Salvador actually bought 1,090 BTC, as its deal with the IMF required the country to cease new purchases.

title: The Funding: Why Coinbase launched an ICO platform — and how its rivals are reacting
contentSnippet: Coinbase is entering the token launch space, a marked shift in business strategy — could the move usher in a new ICO wave?

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dive Deeper Amid AI and Macro Angst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest level in six months. Ethereum dipped below $3,000, its lowest point since mid summer.

title: Google Unveils New AI Weather Model With Faster, More Accurate Forecasts
contentSnippet: Google WeatherNext 2 AI-powered Forecasts now support Search, Gemini, Pixel Weather, and Maps weather tools.

title: Coinbase’s Monad public token sale starts hot and then fizzles
contentSnippet: The much-anticipated public offering of Monad's native token via Coinbase generated about $43 million within the first half hour.

title: Survey of AI Founders Predicts Perplexity is the AI Giant Most Likely to Fail
contentSnippet: Perplexity’s growing stack of lawsuits and scraping allegations added fuel to the skepticism voiced by founders and investors last week.

title: Bitcoin Miner Hive's Stock Rises After Record Q2 Revenue, AI Deal
contentSnippet: Hive Digital Technologies began rebounding Monday after an earnings win and Dell deal to power the Bitcoin miner’s growing AI ambitions.

title: Ethereum Is the Opposite of Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX, Says Vitalik Buterin
contentSnippet: Ethereum is decentralized, "can’t be evil," and is a community—everything that FTX wasn’t, ETH founder Vitalik Buterin said Monday.

title: Blockchain.com names co-CEO as it opens a new US headquarters in Dallas
contentSnippet: Blockchain.com, one of the oldest surviving crypto companies, has appointed a new co-CEO to run its U.S. wing.

title: Bitcoin Treasury KindlyMD Extends Stock Collapse After Earnings Delay
contentSnippet: KindlyMD shares dropped another 10% after missing its Q3 earnings deadline, with the company citing merger accounting complexity and warning of major losses ahead.

title: Grayscale Poised to Debut Dogecoin ETF as VanEck's Solana Fund Starts Trading
contentSnippet: A Grayscale ETF tracking popular meme coin Dogecoin could list next next week, while a VanEck Solana fund debuted Monday.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.
